name: Deus Ex: Nihilum
summary: DXN - Deus Ex: Nihilum is a 2013 total conversion mod for Deus Ex. Set in an Alternate Universe of Deus Ex in the year 2049, it follows the first nano-augmented UNATCO agent Mad Ingram as he heads to Hong Kong in order to solve the mystery of a terrorist attack committed in Shenzhen, and stumbles upon a conspiracy in the process.
